17 March 2009

Driscoll’s profile of Patricius

by Aaron Lord

“I am a servant of Christ to a foreign nation for the unspeakable glory of life everlasting which is in Jesus Christ our Lord.” – Patricius

This is an interesting takeon a very influential missionary (viewer discretion is advised).  I always enjoy reading about the real story of Patrick.
